description.ruby-sapphire:
Heals poisoning, paralysis,
or a burn.
description.emerald:
Heals poisoning, paralysis,
or a burn.
description.firered-leafgreen:
A self-healing move
that cures the user
of a poisoning,
burn, or paralysis.

paralysis.

description.sword-shield:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

effect.full: Removes a burn, paralysis, or poison from the user.
effect.shortEffect: Cleanses the user of a burn, paralysis, or poison.
